title: HyperionEncrypting
extract: Hyperion is a crypter for PE files, developed and presented by Christian Amman in 2012. The tool is a runtime crypter that can transform a Windows portable executables (PE) into an encrypted version that decrypts itself on startup and executes it's original content.Jan 26, 2018
extract_html: Hyperion is a crypter for PE files, developed and presented by Christian Amman in 2012. The tool is a runtime crypter that can transform a Windows portable executables (PE) into an encrypted version that decrypts itself on startup and executes it's original content.Jan 26, 2018
